text: Va gia Nguoi co the nhin thay tinh canh cua nhung ke toi loi guc đau truoc mat Thuong Đe (Allah) cua chung van xin: “Lay Thuong Đe cua bay toi! Chung toi đa thay va nghe (su that). Xin Ngai cho chung toi tro lai tran gian, chung toi se lam đieu thien. Ro that! Bay gio chung toi tin tuong chac chan.”
